items.title: Enable Just Perfection
items.subtitle: Enable or disable the Just Perfection extension

gsetting.title: Panel
gsetting.subtitle: Show or hide the top panel. Does not affect the Full Panel.

gsetting.title: Panel in Overview
gsetting.subtitle:
Show or hide the top panel in overview.
Only works if the panel is disabled, and does not affect the Full Panel.

gsetting.title: Activities Button
gsetting.subtitle:
Show or hide the activities in overview.
If you are using the Full Panel, disable this in the advanced panel settings instead in the panel page.

gsetting.title: Date Menu
gsetting.subtitle:
Show or hide the clock in the panel.
If you are using the Full Panel, disable this in the advanced panel settings instead in the panel page.

gsetting.title: Keyboard Layout Menu
gsetting.subtitle:
Show or hide the keyboard layout switcher in the panel.
When this is enabled, it is only shown if more than one keyboard input is enabled.

gsetting.title: Accessibility Menu
gsetting.subtitle:
Show or hide the accessibility menu in the panel.
When this is enabled, it is only shown if any accessibility features are enabled.

gsetting.title: Quick Settings / System Menu
gsetting.subtitle:
Show or hide the quick settings menu in the panel.
If your are using the Full Panel, disable this in the advanced panel settings instead in the panel page.

gsetting.title: Dark Mode Button (in Quick Settings)
gsetting.subtitle: Show or hide the dark mode toggle in the quick settings menu.

gsetting.title: Screen Sharing Indicator
gsetting.subtitle: Privacy feature that shows an indicator when your screen is shared to an application.

gsetting.title: Screen Recording Indicator
gsetting.subtitle: Privacy feature that shows an indicator when an application is recording your screen.

gsetting.title: Screen Sharing Indicator
gsetting.subtitle: Privacy feature that shows an indicator when your screen is shared to an application.

gsetting.title: Calendar (in Date Menu)
gsetting.subtitle: Displays world clocks in the date menu.

gsetting.title: World Clock (in Date Menu)
gsetting.subtitle: Displays world clocks in the date menu under the calendar.

gsetting.title: Weather (in Date Menu)
gsetting.subtitle: Displays the weather in the date menu under the calendar.

gsetting.title: Events (in Date Menu)
gsetting.subtitle: Displays upcoming calendar events in the date menu.

gsetting.title: Search Bar (in Overview)
gsetting.subtitle: Hides the Search Bar in the Overview. Will become visible again if you start typing.

gsetting.title: Dash (in Overview)
gsetting.subtitle: The dash shows favorited and running applications icons in the overview.

gsetting.title: Dash Seperator
gsetting.subtitle: Show or hide the seperator line between your favorites and running applications on the dash.

gsetting.title: Show Apps Button
gsetting.subtitle:
Show or hides the show applications button on the dash.

If using the Full Panel, disable this in the advanced panel settings instead in the panel page, or enable Arc Menu.

gsetting.title: On Screen Display (OSD)
gsetting.subtitle: Toggles the volume/brightness screen display if you change either of those with a keyboard shortcut.

gsetting.title: Workspace Popup
gsetting.subtitle: Toggles the workspace indicator popup if you switch workspaces with a keyboard shortcut.

gsetting.title: Overview Workspace Preview
gsetting.subtitle: Toggles the workspace indicators in the Overview.

gsetting.title: App Grid Workspace Preview
gsetting.subtitle: Toggles the workspace indicators in the App Grid.

gsetting.title: Window Close Button in Overview
gsetting.subtitle: Toggles the close button when hovering over windows previews in the Overview.

gsetting.title: Window Preview Captions
gsetting.subtitle: Toggles the caption with the window name when hovering over windows previews in the Overview.

gsetting.title: Window Preview Icons
gsetting.subtitle: Shows the window icon under window previews in the Overview.

gsetting.title: Desktop Background Menu
gsetting.subtitle: Toggles menu when right clicking on the desktop.

gsetting.title: Hotcorner Ripple
gsetting.subtitle: Toggles the ripple animation for the hotcorner.

gsetting.title: Screenshot Option in Window Menu
gsetting.subtitle: Show/hide the "Take Screenshot" option when right clicking a Window titlebar.

gsetting.title: Notification Icon
gsetting.subtitle: Shows an icon next to the clock if there is an unread notification.

gsetting.title: Battery Icon
gsetting.subtitle: Shows the battery icon in the panel's indicators.
